text: for the blog post template - is there a way of getting rid of the time from the `publish_date_localized` output? I want the following to just say *“May 18, 2020”*

You can use Hubl filters for this:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/filters#datetimeformat>

Hey guys, I need to add a filter to a blog and display blog tags ( each tag just once ). I have it semi working but its posting each tag more than once. Any ideas on how I can display them just once eahc?
in the blog settings you will find the date formats column where by clicking on customize format you can change the date format at will, in your case MMM d, Y
